# AttributedString.UnicodeScalarView

**Structure**

A view into the underlying storage of the attributed string, as Unicode scalars.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UnicodeScalarView
```

## Accessing Views into the Attributed String

- **AttributedString.CharacterView**: A view into the underlying storage of the attributed string, as Unicode characters.
- **AttributedString.Runs**: An iterable view into segments of the attributed string, each of which indicates where a run of identical attributes begins or ends.

## Conforms To

- BidirectionalCollection
- Collection
- Copyable
- RangeReplaceableCollection
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- Sequence
